subtitles:
24817 28236 They were a race as old
as time itself.

48173 51801 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

51885 55638 Their endless journey brought
them to a small blue world...

55723 58808 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy...

61437 63771 Here they thought
they had finally found...
76118 79787 My name is Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.

81707 84876 l help the strangers
conduct their experiments.
85878 89797 l have betrayed my own kind.

298423 300341 That's all right.
l can help you.

301426 303427 l am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

303512 306138 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

306223 308057 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.

309394 311570 No, l don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

311572 314157 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

314159 317578 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.

367117 370411 l suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...

370495 372580 and they was up
10 minutes ago.

376209 378961 lt's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.

381214 384425 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

384509 386844 l'll take care of it
when l get back.

386928 389388 See that you do. Only thing
makes you a guest...

389473 391766 ln this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.
412454 415998 No days off for good behavior.
429596 433099 He--he just left not 5 minutes ago.

447739 451826 ♪ Like a lazy ocean
hugs the shore ♪

457290 461502 ♪ Like a flower
bending in the breeze ♪

466758 470678 ♪ When we dance
you have a way with me ♪

478270 480646 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
480730 483023 He wanted to speak with you.

511970 515639 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.

521396 524690 l don't understand. You say you're
my husband's doctor...

524774 527651 but he never
mentioned you to me.

529112 531530 John has been coming
to see me for quite some time.

531615 535284 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

538538 541707 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

541791 544043 When was the last time
that you saw him?

545629 549340 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

549424 552384 l understand how difficult
this must be for you.

552469 554887 but for John's sake,
l would like you...

554971 556430 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

556514 560226 lt appears that John has
suffered a psychotic break.

563688 566649 Oh, but l am.
He may be delusional.

569361 572655 lf he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

572739 575783 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
591007 593717 lt is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
619953 621996 Gotta get a grip on myself.

646021 649148 l told the guy
cash on the barrelhead.

652736 656780 - Where's our lucky winner?
- Upstairs, sir, room, uh, 614.
678428 680679 Am l glad you're here, sir.

680764 683349 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

683433 685684 Just take what they
give me, Husselbeck.

708917 710959 MAN: Come on. l ain't got
any ltalian sausages.

725684 727968 - Oh, when--when did l do that?
- When you was last here.

727970 731055 - When--When was that?
- When you left your wallet.

761594 764304 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do, hm?

764389 766298 Well, l'm just trying
to do my job, May.

766300 768470 There's a killer out there,
in case you hadn't noticed.

768472 770139 Maybe you should be
out looking for him...

773815 776525 Aw, go on,
get out of here.

791249 793542 - 6 hookers in all?
- l believe so, sir.

803178 806513 what kind of killer
do you think stops...

810768 812853 CH lEF lNSPECTOR:
Bumstead, what took you?

812937 816064 This killer's been running circles
around us, thanks to Walenski.

816149 819234 With all due respect, chief inspector,
l've known Eddie a long time.

820870 823297 CH l EF l NSPECTOR: Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
823381 825240 he let drift a long time ago.
825325 827034 WALENSKl: Let me talk to Bumstead!

827118 829912 - POLlCEMAN: Come on!
- SECON D POLlCEMAN: Hold on!

833750 836043 - Get his arm!
- WALENSKl: They're watching us!

836127 838504 - On your feet.
- There's no way out!
844969 846261 Let me go, let me go!
846346 847804 l'm not gonna hurt you. l'm not--

859484 862569 l'm being punished
for my sins, right?

862654 864905 What did l ever do
to inherit this?

866991 871161 Well, everything Detective Walenski...
committed to paper should be here, so--

871246 874748 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.

884801 887511 l came here to file a missing persons
report for my husband.
887595 890180 Take it to the front desk.
890265 892099 They told me to come see you.

898273 901984 BUMSTEAD: Do these names
mean anything to you?

904988 906572 Why are you looking
for my husband?

906656 909116 Are you going to accuse him
of something?
918626 920594 Mrs. Murdoch, l am sorry, l'm sorry.

920678 923188 - l didn't mean to alarm you.
- l'm so sorry that l came.

924591 928510 Mrs. Murdoch, if you--Please, if you'll
just give me half a second to explain--

972639 974348 l mean, how do you know
l'm not the killer?

974432 977601 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

978711 980412 You feeling any urges
l should know about?

1041749 1045460 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1046629 1050257 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1132507 1135634 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1135718 1139054 - lt is said he is able to tune.
- lmpossible.

1139138 1141890 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1141974 1144351 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1147605 1151024 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1151108 1153235 But this one was different, yes?

1153319 1154986 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1155071 1156988 He has failed to report in.

1157073 1160158 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.

1173130 1174923 MR. BOOK: Should we
not know, Mr. Hand?

1175007 1178802 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1178886 1181763 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1202869 1205745 l've been so worried about you.

1211252 1213795 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...

1215006 1217090 l don't know what
you're talking about.

1219927 1222387 l found these keys
in my pocket...
1222471 1225098 so l assume l live here.
1225182 1226933 You supposed to be my wife?
1233399 1235775 don't know who l am, do you?

1236694 1239362 Your doctor called me.
He was worried that this might happen.

1255046 1257088 l feel like l'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1257173 1260592 What happened to me?
Why was l seeing a doctor?

1283491 1287327 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1287411 1292582 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1292667 1295710 - l'm sorry. l--
- Failed to report in, yes.

1295795 1298380 l was frightened.
l--l have a weak heart, you know.

1298464 1302759 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1302843 1304970 We found this in his hotel room.

1305054 1308932 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1309016 1310584 l tried to imprint him,
but he woke up.

1310586 1313186 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand. l tried to stop him.

1313187 1315489 - He has no memories, then?
- Only fragments.

1317817 1321569 l--l guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.
1321654 1323196 You have had strays before, right?

1326951 1329995 But that's impossible.
l thought only you had that ability.
1334500 1337043 Of course. l'll imprint him again.

1337128 1340839 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1354895 1356896 EMMA: The police
are looking for you.
1356981 1359232 l know. l saw the papers.
1365322 1368992 l was with one of those women...
1373122 1375457 l--l met her outside an Automat.
1375541 1378752 l guess l wanted to test myself.

1378836 1382714 l wanted to know
if l had it in me to do those things.

1382798 1385759 Maybe l have lost my mind,
but whoever l am, l'm still me...

1402193 1404235 - What?
- JOH N: The car outside...
1405696 1407947 lt's a cop. He dropped me off here.
1410201 1412786 l didn't know he was still here.
1419460 1421252 Wait. You have the wrong man.

1421337 1424047 - Stand aside, will you, please?
- l didn't kill anyone.

1424131 1427793 Right now what you are is a suspect.
Turn yourself in.
1427795 1429695 l'll listen to whatever you have to say.

1429762 1432680 You're not gonna believe
what l have to say.

1436060 1439145 There's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1439230 1442565 And l don't even know if--l--
They're not even--

1442650 1444818 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1451742 1454452 No one ever listens to me.

1509091 1512218 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1513470 1515221 Me and the missus spent
our honeymoon there.

1515306 1518057 All you gotta do is take
Main Street West to--

1522646 1526232 You know, that's funny.
l--l can't seem to remember...

1526317 1528610 if it's Main Street West
or the cross-town.

1533282 1536701 l'm sorry, inspector,
l cannot be of more assistance...

1536785 1538578 but l am running late
for an appointment.

1538662 1540955 Well, l appreciate
your taking the time.

1549256 1551507 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1551592 1556221 l've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1556305 1558932 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1559016 1562602 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1562686 1565104 Well, l do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1565189 1569275 lnspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1569360 1571361 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1575366 1578701 You are a fastidious man. Driven.

1580871 1584290 l would say your life is
rather lonely.

1584375 1587085 Good evening, inspector.
l really must be going.

1656739 1659991 l've been looking through
some of your old reports.

1663287 1667248 The kind that can make
a man's career...

1668125 1671711 - or break it.
- Yeah, l was on that case.

1677593 1680178 l've just been spending time
on the subway...

1687311 1689771 l've been over every
inch of this city.

1694193 1696527 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1699573 1701074 l don't know who she is.
1701158 1702742 l don't know who any of us are.

1704787 1707747 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1707831 1710291 As much as the next guy.

1710376 1713503 See, l've been trying
to remember things--
1715964 1718257 But the more l try to think back...
1718342 1721177 the more it all starts to unravel, and...

1722721 1726391 lt's like l've just been
dreaming this life...

1726475 1729977 and when l finally wake up,
l'll be somebody else.
1739071 1742156 Something to do with the case.
1746203 1748788 lt's all just a big joke!

1791123 1796085 MAN ON P.A.: Tonight's requirements
are 12 family photo albums...
1805262 1807847 l Ds and social security cards.

1807931 1809932 SCH REBER: These do
bring back memories.
1816398 1819525 The recollections of a great lover?

1825532 1830161 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

1830245 1834540 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
1853769 1855978 a tragic death in the family.

1867783 1871410 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the tuning as the others do?

1871495 1875581 l don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

1875666 1878459 A--A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

1878544 1881921 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

1882005 1884507 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

1884591 1887885 That's why you keep changing people...
and things around every night.

1887970 1890813 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...
1890815 1892282 and it's going to bite you on your--

1896228 1899814 lt requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

1899898 1903734 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune--
1905362 1907446 but what other explanation is there?
1978385 1980678 MAN: Frederickson says he'll take me...
1980680 1982456 off the damn night shift soon.
2270143 2272353 SCH REBER: The rich get richer.

2272437 2275731 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.

2334541 2336709 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2336793 2339720 - lf that's what you are, huh, Doctor?
- Mr. Murdoch, please, l--

2339805 2341797 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2341881 2344016 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2344018 2346336 Why can't l remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2346338 2349049 Nothing, nothing.
Please, l want to help you.

2349097 2352558 We can't talk here. lt is not safe.
lf they see us together, they'll--

2352642 2355394 l don't care. l want some answers.
l want some answers now!

2355478 2358564 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?
2364863 2368157 My God. You really can do it.

2369576 2371744 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2371828 2375247 You can make things happen
by will alone. They call it tuning.

2375331 2377249 That is how they make
the buildings change.

2377333 2379835 Just now you acted
out of self-defense. A reflex.

2379919 2382755 But l can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2382839 2385090 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2385175 2386842 We can take the city back.

2445735 2448320 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...

2450990 2453826 So l simply told Frederickson
l was going to have to let him go.
2453910 2456578 And well you should have, darling.

2456663 2460499 He attacked me.
l don't know where he has gone.

2460583 2464169 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2469259 2476849 ♪ They say that you're
a run-around lover ♪

2487861 2495861 ♪ But if you put me down
for another ♪

2507046 2511550 The first subject shall be
imprinted here on Avenue M.
2511634 2514052 Mr. Book. There is a--a problem.

2514137 2517598 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2517682 2521393 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.
2526191 2528483 is more powerful than we thought.
2530737 2534239 So we must become like him.

2534324 2537618 The good doctor
has done as we asked.

2537702 2541747 The life and times of John Murdoch,
Volume 2.

2545835 2549296 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2549380 2552007 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2554469 2556595 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.
2556679 2559306 And as he follows the clues...
2559390 2562184 so shall we follow the memories.
2562268 2564603 But to imprint one of us.

2567398 2570943 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2620410 2624913 l have John Murdoch... in mind.

2626666 2630669 "l found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2634966 2638093 "We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.

2668374 2670375 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
2677633 2679426 You, uh, been working here long?
2681721 2683805 no days off for good behavior.
2748246 2750330 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

2750415 2752958 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

2753042 2755460 but instead we have
been brought here.

2755545 2759464 - This is irrational.
- lnstincts are irrational, Mr. Wall...

2759549 2762968 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

2763052 2766138 Mr. Sleep suggests
he may go to places familiar...
2767557 2769558 He does not care about our job.
2782321 2783822 how my wife had hurt me...

2790663 2794166 l would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2812477 2815437 - How do l get to the end of the line?
- You want the express.
2823154 2826064 P.A.: No trains leave on platform 7.

2826149 2827966 - You want platform 2.
- Got it. Thanks a lot.

2828050 2830327 Hey! How come that train
didn't stop?
2833247 2835123 There's no way out, you know.

2835208 2838126 You can't get out of the city.
Believe me, l've tried.
2841005 2842881 The one they've been looking for.

2842965 2847135 You're not a killer.
They set you up with a fake identity...
2847220 2848762 like everyone else in this place.

2848846 2851264 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.
2851349 2853558 At least, in this life, l was.

2856145 2858355 Then they swap them around
between us.

2858439 2861358 l've seen them do it.
Back and forth, back and forth...

2861442 2863527 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2863611 2864736 How do you know all this?

2864820 2869032 Once in a while, one of us wakes up
while they're changing things.

2869116 2871243 lt's not supposed to happen,
but it does.

2876457 2878041 Just like they'll
come looking for me.
2897687 2899854 This was to be his home.
2902692 2904526 That was when we loved her.
2904610 2906444 This is all well and good, Mr. Hand...

2906529 2910907 but we require a more practical link
to his present whereabouts.
2913703 2918373 Yes. And l know where to find her.

2926215 2929175 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2929260 2932637 - EMMA: l'm sorry?
- To be able to revisit those places...
2932722 2934472 which have meant so very much to us.

2934557 2937601 l thought it was more
that we were haunted by them.

2939729 2942063 There used to be a ferry
when l was a boy...

2944191 2947235 Lit up like a floating
birthday cake.

2948446 2950780 That's just what my husband
once said to me...
2960082 2963126 l met my wife at this place.
2963210 2964961 lt's where l first met my husband.

2987943 2991446 MAN: Ah ha ha! No, ha ha.
No, no, no. Ha ha ha.

3084457 3088585 lt's been so damn long l thought
you'd forgotten your Uncle Karl.

3089545 3091921 You son of a gun!
Ha ha ha ha!
3092006 3094132 Ah ha ha ha ha ha!

3113235 3115987 - Shell Beach is where l grew up?
- That's what l said.

3118407 3121576 l need to get there, Karl.
How do l get there?

3121660 3124829 l don't know.
l haven't been there in years.

3126415 3129626 You gotta have some idea.
Come on!

3132755 3135715 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3144225 3147101 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3147186 3149479 That's me and your pa. Ha!
3149563 3151689 What a couple of handsome fools.

3159949 3162826 They died when their house
burnt down.

3180135 3182762 You burnt your arm
pretty bad in the fire.
3189645 3191563 lt means these are all lies!

3196026 3198361 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3198445 3201114 He told me he wanted
to test himself...
3214837 3216170 l wanted to talk to her.

3216255 3218631 l thought maybe she
could help me find him.
3220384 3222260 Stay here. l'm gonna call the station.
3242281 3245199 lt was a gift from my mother.

3248203 3250538 l keep it with me
to remind me of her.

3259548 3261883 l can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3264470 3267430 How do you think l could
forget a thing like that?
3270517 3273227 l'm not sure l know anymore.
3276690 3279275 l left your old room like it was.
3279360 3281444 You can sleep here tonight, huh?

3281528 3285531 Glad to have you back,
Johnny, even if it is for just a night.

3288994 3292830 Why, sure. That clock's
kept perfect time since l bought it.

3297295 3299354 l don't understand. How can
it be night already?

3299356 3301140 What happened to the day?
How'd l miss it?

3304051 3309055 Look, uh, get some sleep.
We'll straighten all this out tomorrow.
3367906 3369866 Keep him there, and l'll be right over.

3375831 3379250 l can't promise anything, Mrs. Murdoch.
We just have to play it as it comes.

3379334 3382920 Ha ha. Johnny, we--
we just wanted to help. Ha.

3393140 3395433 Johnny, if you're
in some kind of trouble...
3398228 3400730 Haven't seen you in so long.

3477015 3480768 you've been the cause
of much distress.

3485858 3488526 There's no need for this.
There's no escape.
3488610 3490653 The city's ours. We made it.

3492281 3495408 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories...

3495492 3499412 different eras, different pasts,
all rolled into one.

3499496 3503374 Each night, we revise it, refine it,
in order to learn.

3503458 3506294 - Learn what?
- About you, Mr. Murdoch...

3506378 3510423 you and your fellow inhabitants,
what makes you human.
3512050 3514385 We need to be like you.
3514469 3517305 l understand you now, Mr. Murdoch.

3517389 3520933 l remember that which you do not,
what you've been missing.
3523687 3526230 running along the waves as a child...

3531987 3534906 - What are you?
- You've seen what we are.
3534990 3537825 We use your dead as vessels.
3684014 3686474 What about her? Ring any bells?

3686558 3688976 - She was alive when l left her.
- What about this?

3691146 3693397 lt must mean something,
all those pictures.

3695650 3698527 - l don't understand this.
- Stop playing games with me, Murdoch!

3698612 3701030 - Stop telling me lies!
- l am not telling you lies!

3701114 3703449 Help me out here.
Make me understand.

3703533 3705476 l have this jigsaw puzzle
in front of my face...

3705478 3707328 and every time l try
to rearrange the pieces...

3708615 3710210 You--you think it
makes sense to me?

3710212 3712188 l'm as much in the dark
here as you are.
3712250 3713843 You let me ask you a question?

3713845 3715521 You heard of a place
called Shell Beach?

3715587 3717380 - Sure.
- You know how to get there?

3724596 3727807 - Where? Where do you go?
- Just give me a second, will ya?
3732020 3734563 You think that's kind of odd? Hmm?
3735524 3737900 Wait. l got a better one for you.

3739319 3742113 you remember doing
something during the day?

3742197 3745491 - What do you mean?
- l just mean... during the day.

3747077 3749245 Ha. When was the last time
you remember seeing it?

3749329 3751455 And l'm not talking
about some distant...

3753125 3756210 l mean like yesterday?
Last week? When?

3756294 3758712 Can you come up
with a single memory?

3761550 3764718 You know something?
l don't think the sun even...

3767556 3770266 'Cause l've been up for
hours and hours and hours...
3770350 3772476 and the night never ends here.

3772561 3775146 - That is crazy.
- You're damn right this is crazy.

3775230 3777606 Listen to me, Bumstead.
lt's not just me.
3779734 3781277 They're doing something to all of us.

3781361 3784071 - Shut up, you--l--l've heard enough.
- Please listen.

3784156 3785906 - Shut up! Shut up!
- Listen to me!

3796084 3799378 There has to be an explanation
for this somewhere.

3831695 3834788 l never meant to hurt you, John,
and l did it, and l don't know why l did.
3834873 3836957 l wish l could take it all back.
3837042 3839543 No. Emma, you didn't do it.

3839628 3842038 This... affair of yours,
whatever it is...

3842040 3843824 that you think you're
supposed to have done--

3843826 3845919 You didn't do it.
l don't believe it ever happened.

3845967 3849720 - What do you mean?
- l know this is gonna sound crazy...

3849804 3852723 but what if we never
knew each other before now?

3852807 3856894 What if the first time we ever met
was last night...

3861767 3863917 and everything that
l'm supposed to remember...
3864986 3867571 Someone just wants us to think it did.
3868573 3870908 But how can that be true?
3870992 3874870 l so vividly remember meeting you.

3874955 3878916 l remember falling
in love with you.
3899563 3902523 You can't fake something like that.

3940979 3944732 l, um,
kind of thought you should know.

3947319 3951238 Oh, and the chief
wanted to see you.

3958413 3960456 l knew you'd track
the killer down, sir.

3990320 3993864 - How can we help you, sir?
- You can sleep.

4016388 4020265 l wanted to be the first
to congratulate you about the case.

4058555 4061265 Don't you think it's about time
you started giving me some answers?

4070525 4072901 lt's one of the few places
l'm allowed a moment's peace.

4072986 4077448 You--you see, they have
an aversion to--to water.
4077532 4079366 One could almost call it a phobia.

4079451 4081243 - Ha ha ha ha.
- Who are they?

4257295 4260297 trying to divine

4309847 4312391 our souls, that makes
